message.content:
Implement the following plan:

# Plan: Competitor Comparison Pages for Vaultaire Website

## Context

Build 21 static HTML pages comparing Vaultaire against the top 10 photo vault competitors on the App Store. Pages live at `web/compare/` and serve dual purpose: SEO (rank for "[competitor] alternative" and "vaultaire vs [competitor]" queries) and conversion (show Vaultaire's encryption advantage over competitors that mostly use PIN screens over unencrypted files).

## The 10 competitors

| # | App | Slug | ID | Ratings |
|---|-----|------|----|---------|
| 1 | Private Photo Vault - Pic Safe | `private-photo-vault` | 417571834 | 998K |
| 2 | Secret Photo Vault: Keepsafe | `keepsafe` | 510873505 | 369K |
| 3 | Privault | `privault` | 1186436980 | 77K |
| 4 | SPV - Photo Vault | `spv` | 1449239240 | 68K |
| 5 | Secret Photo Album SA | `secret-photo-album` | 1174964304 | 39K |
| 6 | PV Secret Photo Album | `pv-secret-photo-album` | 867586326 | 30K |
| 7 | Calculator# Hide Photos Videos | `calculator-hide-photos` | 1165276801 | 29K |
| 8 | Secret Photo Vault Lock Photos | `secret-photo-vault` | 448033053 | 27K |
| 9 | Hide it Pro | `hide-it-pro` | 523488488 | 24K |
| 10 | Safe Lock - Hidden Photo Vault | `safe-lock` | 1195429570 | 24K |

## File structure

```
web/compare/
├── index.html                              # Grid of competitor cards
├── styles.css                              # Shared CSS for all compare pages
├── vaultaire-vs-private-photo-vault/
│   ├── index.html                          # Comparison page
│   └── review/index.html                   # Long-form article
├── vaultaire-vs-keepsafe/
│   ├── index.html
│   └── review/index.html
├── ... (8 more competitor directories)

outputs/vaultaire/competitors/
├── private-photo-vault.json                # Scraped data + review themes
├── keepsafe.json
├── ... (8 more)
```

Total: 1 CSS + 1 index + 10 comparison pages + 10 review articles = 22 new files + 10 data JSONs. 5 existing pages get footer updates.

## Phase 1: Data collection

For each of the 10 competitors:
1. Fetch current metadata from iTunes lookup API (`itunes.apple.com/lookup?id=APPID`) — includes `price` and `formattedPrice`
2. Scrape App Store web page for reviews (focus on 1-3 star negative reviews)
3. Scrape App Store page for in-app purchase pricing (subscription tiers, lifetime options)
4. Analyze competitor description to fill 17-feature boolean table
5. Identify top 3-5 complaint themes from negative reviews
6. Write positioning statement and Vaultaire response for each complaint
7. Document pricing: free tier limits, subscription prices, what's locked behind paywall

Store as JSON in `outputs/vaultaire/competitors/[slug].json`. Reuse existing data from `outputs/vaultaire/01-research/raw-data/` where available.

## Phase 2: Infrastructure

### `web/compare/styles.css` (shared)

Extract CSS from existing inner pages (manifesto/privacy pattern). Contains:
- CSS variables (`--bg`, `--surface`, `--text`, `--accent`, `--highlight`) with dark/light theme
- Header/nav (glassmorphism, logo toggle, nav-links)
- Footer (existing links + new compare links row)
- Compare-specific: `.compare-hero`, `.compare-table`, `.compare-section`, `.compare-reviews`, `.compare-cta`, `.compare-card`, `.breadcrumbs`, `.review-article`
- Responsive at 900px and 768px breakpoints
- Angular/beveled aesthetic matching main site (clip-path buttons, Space Grotesk headings, Plus Jakarta Sans body)

### `web/compare/index.html` (compare landing)

Grid of 10 competitor cards. Each card: hotlinked icon, "Vaultaire vs X" heading, rating count, one-line differentiator. Links to comparison page.

SEO: title "Vaultaire vs Competitors | Photo Vault Comparison", Schema.org ItemList.

### Footer updates (5 existing pages)

Add to all pages:
1. "Compare" link in main footer-links row
2. New `footer-compare` row with all 10 competitor page links (for SEO internal linking)
3. Small inline CSS addition for `footer-compare` styling (since existing pages use inline CSS)

Pages: `index.html`, `manifesto/index.html`, `privacy/index.html`, `terms/index.html`, `s/index.html`

Path prefixes: root pages use `compare/...`, sub-pages use `../compare/...`

## Phase 3: Comparison pages (10 pages)

URL: `web/compare/vaultaire-vs-[slug]/index.html`

Each page structure:
1. Breadcrumbs: Home / Compare / vs [Competitor]
2. Hero: competitor icon (hotlinked Apple CDN), "Vaultaire vs [Competitor]" h1, positioning statement
3. Feature table: 17 rows, Vaultaire vs Competitor columns, checkmarks + notes
4. Pricing comparison: side-by-side tiers showing what each tier includes, Vaultaire vs competitor
5. 3-4 deep-dive sections (encryption, duress, privacy, user complaints)
6. "What users say" section (scraped review complaints + how Vaultaire addresses them)
7. CTA: Download Vaultaire
8. Link to full review article
9. "More comparisons" nav linking to other 9 pages

SEO per page: unique title/description, canonical URL, og: tags, Schema.org SoftwareApplication, keywords from ASO research.

### 17-feature comparison table (consistent across all pages)

1. AES-256-GCM encryption
2. Secure Enclave hardware keys
3. Pattern lock (not PIN)
4. Multiple independent vaults
5. Duress vault (destroy on trigger)
6. Zero-knowledge architecture (no accounts)
7. Encrypted iCloud backup
8. Encrypted vault sharing
9. Recovery phrase
10. No biometrics (by design)
11. Photos, Videos & Files support
12. Media optimization (HEIC/HEVC)
13. Free tier available
14. No ads in free tier
15. Share sheet import
16. Camera capture
17. Offline-only by default

### Pricing comparison section (on each page, below feature table)

Side-by-side pricing breakdown. Vaultaire pricing:
- **Free**: 1 vault, 100 files, pattern lock, AES-256 encryption, camera/photo import
- **Pro Monthly**: $1.99/mo — unlimited vaults, unlimited files, duress vault, iCloud backup, vault sharing
- **Pro Annual**: $9.99/yr — same as monthly, 58% savings
- **Pro Lifetime**: $29.99 one-time — all Pro features forever

For each competitor, show their equivalent tiers and what's included/excluded. Highlight where Vaultaire's free tier includes features competitors lock behind paywalls (e.g., real encryption in the free tier). Also highlight where Vaultaire's paid tier is cheaper for equivalent features.

## Phase 4: Review articles (10 pages)

URL: `web/compare/vaultaire-vs-[slug]/review/index.html`

Long-form blog-post style. Structure:
1. "[Competitor] Review: Is It Worth It in 2026?" h1
2. Overview of competitor
3. Feature-by-feature analysis with Vaultaire comparison
4. Pricing analysis
5. User complaints deep-dive (expanded, with quotes from scraped reviews)
6. How Vaultaire addresses each pain point
7. Verdict + CTA

SEO targets: "[competitor] alternative", "[competitor] review 2026", "is [competitor] safe"

All copy run through /humanizer skill.

## Phase 5: SEO audit + polish

- Verify all internal links work (no broken hrefs)
- Verify canonical URLs, og: tags, meta descriptions are unique per page
- Check Schema.org JSON-LD validity
- Test mobile rendering at 375px, 768px, 1024px
- Verify theme toggle on all new pages
- Verify breadcrumbs link correctly
- Check all competitor icon URLs load

## Design decisions

- **Shared CSS** (new pattern): compare pages use `<link href="../styles.css">` instead of inline styles. Existing pages keep inline CSS unchanged.
- **Competitor icons**: hotlink from Apple CDN (`is1-ssl.mzstatic.com`). No local hosting. Avoids trademark issues.
- **No templating engine**: pages are hand-written static HTML (matches existing site). Trade-off: more repetition, but no build complexity.
- **Relative paths**: compare/index.html uses `../` for root, comparison pages use `../../`, review pages use `../../../`

## Verification

1. All 22 new pages render correctly in browser (dark + light theme)
2. Mobile layout works at 375px width
3. All footer links across 27 pages point to valid destinations
4. Competitor icons load from Apple CDN
5. Schema.org validates via Google Rich Results Test
6. No broken internal links
7. Each page has unique title + meta description
8. Deploy to Cloudflare Pages and verify live


If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/nan/.REDACTED.jsonl

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en"><head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta name="description" content="Vaultaire: The local-first encrypted vault for iOS. Protect your files with pattern-based security. No accounts, no data tracking, pure privacy by design.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="encrypted storage, iOS vault, privacy app, local-first, pattern lock, secure photo vault">
    <meta property="og:title" content="Vaultaire | Protected by Design">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Secure your digital life with Vaultaire. Local-first encryption, zero knowledge, pattern-based access.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://vaultaire.app">
    <meta property="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <link rel="canonical" href="https://vaultaire.app">
    <title>Vaultaire | Protected by Design</title>

    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin="">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=Space+Grotesk:wght@300;500;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

    <script type="application/ld+json">
    {
      "@context": "https://schema.org",
      "@type": "SoftwareApplication",
      "name": "Vaultaire",
      "operatingSystem": "iOS",
      "applicationCategory": "SecurityApplication",
      "offers": {
        "@type": "Offer",
        "price": "0",
        "priceCurrency": "USD"
      },
      "description": "Local-first encrypted storage on iPhone with pattern-based access and plausible deniability."
    }
    </script>

    <style>
        :root {
            --app-bg-light: #D1D1E9;
            --app-bg-dark: #20233C;
            --app-surface-light: #FFFFFE;
            --app-surface-dark: #323444;
            --app-text-light: #2B2C34;
            --app-text-dark: #E8E8F0;
            --app-accent-light: #1F0D77;
            --app-accent-dark: #CCC3F8;
            --app-highlight-light: #E45858;
            --app-highlight-dark: #FF6F6F;

            --bg-dark: #20233C;
            --bg-light: #2A2D49;
            --surface-dark: #323444;
            --surface-light: #3A3D55;
            --text-dark: #E8E8F0;
            --text-light: #D6D8EC;
            --accent-dark: #CCC3F8;
            --accent-light: #CCC3F8;
            --highlight-dark: #FF6F6F;
            --highlight-light: #FF6F6F;
            --text-secondary: #9FA1B5;
            --header-bg: rgba(32, 35, 60, 0.8);
            --header-border: rgba(204, 195, 248, 0.22);
            --theme-button-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
            --theme-button-text: #E8E8F0;
            --pattern-link: #57E37A;
            --phone-frame-bg: #06070E;
            --phone-screen-bg: #20233C;
            --phone-screen-border: rgba(204, 195, 248, 0.18);
            --phone-text-primary: #E8E8F0;
            --phone-text-secondary: rgba(232, 232, 240, 0.78);
            --phone-dot-inactive: rgba(232, 232, 240, 0.39);
            --phone-dot-border: rgba(232, 232, 240, 0.23);
            --phone-dot-active: #CCC3F8;
            --phone-line-color: rgba(204, 195, 248, 0.70);
            --phone-shield-fill: rgba(232, 232, 240, 0.76);
            --phone-shield-cut: #20233C;
            --phone-action-primary: rgba(232, 232, 240, 0.78);
            --phone-action-secondary: rgba(232, 232, 240, 0.55);
            --phone-unlock-pixel: rgba(66, 108, 195, 0.82);
            --phone-unlock-pixel-dim: rgba(66, 108, 195, 0.30);
            --accent-contrast: #20233C;

            --angle-sharp: 0px;
            --border-width: 2px;
            --x-angle: 15deg;
            --font-display: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
            --font-body: 'Plus Jakarta Sans', sans-serif;
            --ease-cinematic: cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);
        }

        :root[data-theme='light'] {
            --bg-dark: #D1D1E9;
            --bg-light: #E3E4F4;
            --surface-dark: #FFFFFE;
            --surface-light: #FFFFFF;
            --text-dark: #2B2C34;
            --text-light: #4D4F67;
            --accent-dark: #1F0D77;
            --accent-light: #1F0D77;
            --highlight-dark: #E45858;
            --highlight-light: #E45858;
            --text-secondary: #6C6F88;
            --header-bg: rgba(209, 209, 233, 0.86);
            --header-border: rgba(31, 13, 119, 0.18);
            --theme-button-bg: rgba(31, 13, 119, 0.09);
            --theme-button-text: #1F0D77;
            --pattern-link: #2E9E4D;
            --phone-frame-bg: #B8BCD2;
            --phone-screen-bg: #D1D1E9;
            --phone-screen-border: rgba(31, 13, 119, 0.22);
            --phone-text-primary: #2B2C34;
            --phone-text-secondary: rgba(43, 44, 52, 0.70);
            --phone-dot-inactive: rgba(43, 44, 52, 0.35);
            --phone-dot-border: rgba(43, 44, 52, 0.21);
            --phone-dot-active: #1F0D77;
            --phone-line-color: rgba(31, 13, 119, 0.70);
            --phone-shield-fill: rgba(43, 44, 52, 0.3);
            --phone-shield-cut: #D1D1E9;
            --phone-action-primary: rgba(43, 44, 52, 0.70);
            --phone-action-secondary: rgba(43, 44, 52, 0.50);
            --phone-unlock-pixel: rgba(31, 13, 119, 0.82);
            --phone-unlock-pixel-dim: rgba(31, 13, 119, 0.30);
            --accent-contrast: #F8F8FF;
        }

        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        html {
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
        }

        body {
            background-color: var(--bg-dark);
            color: var(--text-dark);
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            overflow-x: hidden;
            line-height: 1.6;
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
            transition: background-color 240ms ease, color 240ms ease;
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
        }

        a { text-decoration: none; color: inherit; transition: 0.3s ease; }
        ul { list-style: none; }

        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 24px;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
        }

        .text-gradient {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--text-dark) 0%, var(--accent-dark) 100%);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        }

        .highlight-text {
            color: var(--highlight-dark);
        }

        /* ── Buttons ── */
        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: 18px 36px;
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            position: relative;
            clip-path: polygon(10px 0, 100% 0, 100% calc(100% - 10px), calc(100% - 10px) 100%, 0 100%, 0 10px);
            transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94);
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .btn-primary {
            background-color: var(--accent-dark);
            color: var(--accent-contrast);
        }

        .btn-primary::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            transform: translateX(-100%);
            transition: transform 0.4s;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .btn-primary:hover::before {
            transform: translateX(0);
        }

        .btn-primary:hover {
            background-color: var(--accent-dark);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(31, 13, 119, 0.3);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: transparent;
            border: 2px solid var(--text-dark);
            color: var(--text-dark);
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: var(--surface-dark);
            border-color: var(--accent-dark);
        }

        /* ── Header / Nav ── */
        header {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 1000;
            background: var(--header-bg);
            backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--header-border);
            transition: background-color 240ms ease, border-color 240ms ease;
        }

        .nav-inner {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            height: 80px;
        }

        .logo {
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            letter-spacing: 0.01em;
            color: var(--text-dark);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .logo .logo-mark {
            width: 28px;
            height: 28px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: block;
            box-shadow: 0 6px 14px color-mix(in srgb, var(--bg-dark) 68%, transparent 32%);
        }

        .logo .logo-mark--light {
            display: none;
        }

        :root[data-theme='light'] .logo .logo-mark--dark {
            display: none;
        }

        :root[data-theme='light'] .logo .logo-mark--light {
            display: block;
        }

        .logo span {
            color: var(--text-dark);
        }

        .nav-links {
            display: flex;
            gap: 32px;
        }

        .nav-links a {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            opacity: 0.8;
            position: relative;
        }

        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -5px;
            left: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--accent-dark);
            transition: width 0.3s;
        }

        .nav-links a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }

        .nav-cta {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
        }

        .theme-toggle {
            border: 1px solid var(--header-border);
            background: var(--theme-button-bg);
            color: var(--theme-button-text);
            height: 44px;
            min-width: 44px;
            padding: 0 14px;
            border-radius: 999px;
            font: 600 0.82rem var(--font-body);
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: transform 180ms ease, background-color 180ms ease, border-color 180ms ease;
        }

        .theme-toggle:hover {
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        .theme-toggle:focus-visible {
            outline: 2px solid var(--accent-dark);
            outline-offset: 2px;
        }

        .theme-icon {
            font-size: 1rem;
            line-height: 1;
        }

        /* ── Hero ── */
        .hero {
            position: relative;
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding-top: 80px;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .hero-bg-x {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
            z-index: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .slash-1 {
            position: absolute;
            width: 200%;
            height: 2px;
            top: 0;
            left: -50%;
            transform: rotate(35deg);
            transform-origin: center;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, var(--highlight-dark), transparent);
            opacity: 0.8;
        }
        .slash-2 {
            position: absolute;
            width: 200%;
            height: 2px;
            top: 0;
            left: -50%;
            transform: rotate(-35deg);
            transform-origin: center;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, var(--highlight-dark), transparent);
            opacity: 0.8;
        }

        #pattern-canvas {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: 0;
            opacity: 0.3;
        }

        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            width: 100%;
        }

        /* Hero: Two-column grid — stacked title (724b) + phone mockup (9bff) */
        .hero-layout {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1.2fr 1fr;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 40px;
            width: 100%;
        }

        /* Stacked title from design-724b */
        .hero-title-stack {
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            font-size: clamp(3.5rem, 7vw, 7rem);
            line-height: 0.85;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: -0.03em;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .stack-layer {
            display: block;
            transition: transform 0.5s var(--ease-cinematic);
        }

        .stack-1 {
            color: transparent;
            -webkit-text-stroke: 1px var(--text-secondary);
            opacity: 0.5;
            transform: translateX(-20px);
        }

        .stack-2 {
            color: var(--accent-dark);
            opacity: 0.8;
        }

        .stack-3 {
            color: var(--text-dark);
            position: relative;
            z-index: 10;
        }

        .hero-sub {
            margin-top: 2rem;
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            color: var(--text-dark);
            opacity: 0.8;
            max-width: 600px;
            border-left: 2px solid var(--highlight-dark);
            padding-left: 20px;
        }

        .hero-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            margin-top: 48px;
        }

        /* ── Phone Mockup ── */
        .mockup-container {
            position: relative;
            width: min(336px, 100%);
            height: 700px;
            margin-left: auto;
        }

        .phone-frame {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: var(--phone-frame-bg);
            border-radius: 46px;
            padding: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 38px 90px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.46), 0 0 0 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
            position: relative;
            transition: transform 220ms ease;
        }

        .phone-frame:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .phone-screen {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: var(--phone-screen-bg);
            border-radius: 36px;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
            border: 1px solid var(--phone-screen-border);
            padding: 12px 12px 18px;
        }

        .phone-status {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            font-size: 0.88rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin: 2px 8px 8px;
            color: var(--phone-text-primary);
            opacity: 0.9;
            position: relative;
            min-height: 28px;
            z-index: 5;
        }

        .phone-dynamic-island {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            top: 1px;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            width: 122px;
            height: 24px;
            border-radius: 999px;
            background: #05060A;
        }

        .status-right {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        .status-icon-svg {
            width: 14px;
            height: 14px;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: currentColor;
            opacity: 0.95;
        }

        .status-icon-svg svg {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            display: block;
        }

        .status-battery {
            width: 20px;
            height: 10px;
            border-radius: 2px;
            border: 1px solid color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 62%, transparent 38%);
            position: relative;
        }

        .status-battery::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            right: -3px;
            top: 2px;
            width: 2px;
            height: 4px;
            border-radius: 1px;
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 62%, transparent 38%);
        }

        .status-battery::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 1px;
            left: 1px;
            width: 12px;
            height: 6px;
            border-radius: 1px;
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-dot-active) 65%, var(--phone-screen-bg) 35%);
        }

        .mockup-stage {
            position: absolute;
            inset: 46px 12px 18px;
            border-radius: 28px;
            transition: opacity 220ms ease;
        }

        .mockup-lock-state {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: auto;
        }

        .mockup-unlock-state {
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            display: grid;
            place-items: center;
        }

        .mockup-vault-state {
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 10px;
            padding: 2px 2px 0;
            min-height: 0;
        }

        .phone-screen.mockup-unlocking .mockup-lock-state {
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .phone-screen.mockup-unlocking .mockup-unlock-state {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .phone-screen.mockup-vault .mockup-lock-state,
        .phone-screen.mockup-vault .mockup-unlock-state {
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .phone-screen.mockup-vault .mockup-vault-state {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: auto;
        }

        .lock-header {
            margin-top: 70px;
            display: grid;
            gap: 10px;
            place-items: center;
        }

        .lock-shield {
            width: 44px;
            height: 44px;
            border-radius: 12px;
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 10%, transparent 90%);
            display: grid;
            place-items: center;
            color: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 78%, transparent 22%);
            font-size: 1rem;
        }

        .lock-title {
            font-family: var(--font-body);
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: none;
            letter-spacing: -0.01em;
            color: var(--phone-text-primary);
            margin: 0;
        }

        .pattern-lock-zone {
            width: 226px;
            height: 226px;
            position: relative;
            margin-top: 50px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }

        .pattern-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            gap: 34px;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 5;
        }

        .grid-dot {
            width: 18px;
            height: 18px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: var(--phone-dot-inactive);
            border: 1px solid var(--phone-dot-border);
            transition: background-color 180ms ease, box-shadow 180ms ease;
        }

        .grid-dot.active {
            background: var(--phone-dot-active);
            border-color: transparent;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-dot-active) 30%, transparent 70%);
        }

        .pattern-svg {
            position: absolute;
            inset: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: 4;
        }

        .pattern-line {
            stroke: var(--phone-line-color);
            stroke-width: 4;
            stroke-linecap: round;
            stroke-linejoin: round;
            fill: none;
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 6px color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-dot-active) 52%, transparent 48%));
        }

        .pattern-cursor {
            fill: var(--phone-dot-active);
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 3px color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-dot-active) 62%, transparent 38%));
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 120ms ease;
        }

        .lock-actions {
            margin-top: auto;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            display: grid;
            gap: 12px;
            place-items: center;
        }

        .lock-action {
            color: var(--phone-text-secondary);
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            opacity: 0.85;
        }

        .lock-action-primary {
            opacity: 1;
            color: var(--phone-action-primary);
        }

        .lock-action-secondary {
            opacity: 1;
            color: var(--phone-action-secondary);
        }

        .unlock-wrap {
            display: grid;
            gap: 14px;
            place-items: center;
            transform: translateY(-8px);
        }

        .unlock-pixel {
            width: 14px;
            height: 14px;
            border-radius: 2px;
            background: var(--phone-unlock-pixel-dim);
            animation: unlockPulse 1s infinite ease-in-out;
        }

        .unlock-text {
            color: var(--phone-text-secondary);
            font-size: 1.02rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .vault-app-header {
            width: 100%;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 34px 1fr 34px;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-top: 2px;
        }

        .vault-app-btn {
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 1px solid color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 22%, transparent 78%);
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 8%, transparent 92%);
            color: var(--phone-text-primary);
            display: grid;
            place-items: center;
            font-size: 0.84rem;
        }

        .vault-app-title {
            margin: 0;
            color: var(--phone-text-primary);
            font-size: 0.92rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .vault-search-row {
            width: 100%;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 30px 30px;
            gap: 6px;
            align-items: center;
            margin-top: 2px;
        }

        .vault-search {
            height: 32px;
            border-radius: 9px;
            border: 1px solid color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 14%, transparent 86%);
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 6%, transparent 94%);
            color: var(--phone-text-secondary);
            font-size: 0.82rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 0 10px;
        }

        .vault-search-icon {
            margin-right: 6px;
            opacity: 0.7;
            font-size: 0.72rem;
        }

        .vault-chip {
            height: 30px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            border: 1px solid color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 18%, transparent 82%);
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 8%, transparent 92%);
            color: var(--phone-text-secondary);
            display: grid;
            place-items: center;
            font-size: 0.78rem;
        }

        .vault-section-label {
            color: var(--phone-text-secondary);
            font-size: 0.82rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-top: 1px;
            padding-left: 2px;
            margin-bottom: 2px;
        }

        .vault-grid {
            width: 100%;
            flex: 1;
            min-height: 0;
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            grid-template-rows: repeat(6, minmax(0, 1fr));
            gap: 2px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            overflow: hidden;
            align-content: stretch;
        }

        .vault-cell {
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 6%, transparent 94%);
            position: relative;
            border: 1px solid color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-text-primary) 8%, transparent 92%);
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .vault-thumb {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
            display: block;
            filter: saturate(1.08) contrast(1.02);
        }

        .vault-cell::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            inset: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(180deg, transparent 58%, rgba(8, 10, 20, 0.35) 100%);
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .vault-cell-time {
            position: absolute;
            left: 3px;
            bottom: 3px;
            font-size: 0.54rem;
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            background: rgba(20, 22, 36, 0.75);
            border-radius: 3px;
            padding: 0 3px;
            z-index: 2;
        }

        .vault-fab {
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            bottom: 12px;
            width: 44px;
            height: 44px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: none;
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-dot-active) 84%, white 16%);
            color: color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-screen-bg) 82%, black 18%);
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            line-height: 1;
            display: grid;
            place-items: center;
            box-shadow: 0 6px 14px color-mix(in srgb, var(--phone-dot-active) 32%, transparent 68%);
        }

        /* ── Trust Strip ── */
        .trust-strip {
            background: var(--highlight-light);
            padding: 24px 0;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 3;
            transform: skewY(-2deg);
            margin-top: -60px;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--surface-light);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--surface-light);
        }

        .trust-content {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            transform: skewY(2deg);
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .trust-item {
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            color: var(--surface-light);
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .trust-item::before {
            content: '\00d7';
            color: var(--bg-dark);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 900;
        }

        /* ── Features ── */
        .features {
            padding: 120px 0;
            background: var(--bg-light);
            color: var(--text-light);
            position: relative;
            clip-path: polygon(0 50px, 100% 0, 100% calc(100% - 50px), 0 100%);
        }

        .section-header {
            margin-bottom: 80px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .section-header h2 {
            font-size: 3rem;
            color: var(--text-dark);
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }

        .feature-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 30px;
        }

        .feature-card {
            background: var(--surface-light);
            padding: 40px;
            position: relative;
            clip-path: polygon(
                20px 0, 100% 0,
                100% calc(100% - 20px),
                calc(100% - 20px) 100%,
                0 100%, 0 20px
            );
            transition: transform 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(32, 35, 60, 0.1);
        }

        .feature-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
        }

        .feature-card::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0; right: 0;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom left, var(--highlight-light) 50%, transparent 50%);
        }

        .feature-icon {
            font-size: 2rem;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
            color: var(--accent-light);
        }

        .feature-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
            color: var(--text-dark);
        }

        .feature-card p {
            color: var(--text-light);
            font-size: 1rem;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }

        /* ── Timeline ── */
        .timeline-section {
            padding: 120px 0;
            background: var(--bg-dark);
        }

        .timeline {
            position: relative;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .timeline::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            top: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 2px;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            transform: translateX(-50%);
        }

        .step {
            position: relative;
            margin-bottom: 80px;
            width: 50%;
        }

        .step:nth-child(odd) {
            left: 0;
            padding-right: 60px;
            text-align: right;
        }

        .step:nth-child(even) {
            left: 50%;
            padding-left: 60px;
        }

        .step-marker {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            background: var(--bg-dark);
            border: 2px solid var(--highlight-dark);
            transform: rotate(45deg);
            z-index: 2;
        }

        .step:nth-child(odd) .step-marker {
            right: -11px;
        }

        .step:nth-child(even) .step-marker {
            left: -11px;
        }

        .step-number {
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            font-size: 4rem;
            color: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            font-weight: 800;
            position: absolute;
            top: -20px;
            line-height: 1;
        }

        .step:nth-child(odd) .step-number { right: 40px; }
        .step:nth-child(even) .step-number { left: 40px; }

        .step h3 {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            color: var(--text-dark);
            position: relative;
        }

        .step p {
            color: var(--accent-dark);
        }

        /* ── Security ── */
        .security-section {
            background: var(--surface-dark);
            padding: 100px 0;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
        }

        .tech-specs {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 60px;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .tech-diagram {
            background: var(--bg-dark);
            border: 1px solid var(--accent-light);
            padding: 40px;
            position: relative;
        }

        .tech-diagram::before, .tech-diagram::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border-color: var(--highlight-light);
            border-style: solid;
            transition: all 0.5s;
        }
        .tech-diagram::before { top: -1px; left: -1px; border-width: 2px 0 0 2px; }
        .tech-diagram::after { bottom: -1px; right: -1px; border-width: 0 2px 2px 0; }

        .code-block {
            font-family: monospace;
            color: var(--accent-dark);
            line-height: 1.8;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .code-key { color: var(--highlight-dark); }
        .code-val { color: var(--text-dark); }

        .tech-content h3 {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }

        .tech-content ul {
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .tech-content li {
            margin-bottom: 16px;
            padding-left: 24px;
            position: relative;
            color: var(--text-dark);
        }

        .tech-content li::before {
            content: '/';
            color: var(--highlight-light);
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        /* ── FAQ ── */
        .faq-section {
            padding: 120px 0;
            background: var(--bg-dark);
        }

        .faq-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .faq-item {
            border: 1px solid color-mix(in srgb, var(--text-dark) 12%, transparent 88%);
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--surface-dark) 58%, transparent 42%);
            transition: 0.3s;
        }

        .faq-item[open] {
            border-color: var(--highlight-light);
            background: var(--surface-dark);
        }

        .faq-summary {
            padding: 24px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-family: var(--font-display);
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            list-style: none;
        }

        .faq-summary::-webkit-details-marker { display: none; }

        .faq-summary::after {
            content: '+';
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--highlight-dark);
            transition: transform 0.3s;
        }

        .faq-item[open] .faq-summary::after {
            transform: rotate(45deg);
        }

        .faq-content {
            padding: 0 24px 24px 24px;
            color: var(--text-dark);
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        /* ── Final CTA ── */
        .final-cta {
            padding: 140px 0;
            text-align: center;
            background: radial-gradient(circle at center, var(--accent-light) 0%, var(--bg-dark) 70%);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .final-cta h2 {
            font-size: 4rem;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            line-height: 1;
        }

        /* ── Footer ── */
        footer {
            background: color-mix(in srgb, var(--bg-dark) 82%, #07080D 18%);
            padding: 60px 0;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            border-top: 1px solid color-mix(in srgb, var(--text-dark) 14%, transparent 86%);
        }

        .footer-content {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
        }

        .footer-links a {
            margin-left: 24px;
            color: var(--accent-dark);
        }
        .footer-links a:hover { color: var(--highlight-dark); }

        /* ── Grid Overlay ── */
        .grid-overlay {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%; height: 100%;
            background-image: radial-gradient(var(--text-dark) 1px, transparent 1px);
            background-size: 40px 40px;
            opacity: 0.05;
            z-index: 1;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        /* ── Responsive ── */
        @media (max-width: 900px) {
            .hero-layout {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
                text-align: center;
            }
            .hero-sub { border-left: none; padding-left: 0; margin-inline: auto; }
            .hero-actions { justify-content: center; }
            .mockup-container {
                margin: 40px auto;
                height: 660px;
            }
            .hero-title-stack { align-items: center; }
            .stack-1 { transform: translateX(0); }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .hero-title-stack { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 8vw, 4rem); }
            .timeline::before { left: 20px; }
            .step { width: 100%; padding-left: 60px !important; text-align: left !important; left: 0 !important; }
            .step:nth-child(odd) .step-marker, .step:nth-child(even) .step-marker { left: 9px; }
            .step-number { left: 60px !important; }
            .tech-specs { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .nav-links { display: none; }
            .logo {
                font-size: 1.1rem;
            }
            .logo .logo-mark {
                width: 24px;
                height: 24px;
                border-radius: 7px;
            }
            .trust-content { flex-direction: column; }
            .theme-toggle #theme-label {
                display: none;
            }
            .mockup-container {
                width: min(100%, 340px);
                height: 620px;
            }
            .pattern-lock-zone {
                width: 218px;
                height: 218px;
                margin-top: 42px;
            }
            .lock-title {
                font-size: 1.15rem;
            }
        }

        @keyframes loaderPulse {
            0% {
                opacity: 0.45;
                transform: scale(0.86);
            }
            50% {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: scale(1);
                background: var(--app-accent-dark);
            }
            100% {
                opacity: 0.45;
                transform: scale(0.86);
            }
        }

        @keyframes unlockPulse {
            0% {
                opacity: 0.42;
                transform: scale(0.86);
                background: var(--phone-unlock-pixel-dim);
            }
            50% {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: scale(1);
                background: var(--phone-unlock-pixel);
            }
            100% {
                opacity: 0.42;
                transform: scale(0.86);
                background: var(--phone-unlock-pixel-dim);
            }
        }

        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { opacity: 0.3; }
            50% { opacity: 0.6; }
            100% { opacity: 0.3; }
        }
    </style>
</head>

        <!-- Trust Strip (from baseline design-4379) -->
        <section class="trust-strip">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="trust-content">
                    <div class="trust-item">No Accounts</div>
                    <div class="trust-item">No Personal Data</div>
                    <div class="trust-item">No Backdoors</div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- Features (from baseline design-4379) -->
        <section id="features" class="features">
            <div class="grid-overlay"></div>
            <div class="container">
                <div class="section-header">
                    <h2>Zero Knowledge. Zero Compromise.</h2>
                    <p style="color: var(--text-light); max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto;">Your data never leaves your device unencrypted. We build privacy architecture, not data vacuums.</p>
                </div>

                <div class="feature-grid">
                    <div class="feature-card">
                        <div class="feature-icon">🔐</div>
                        <h3>Pattern Encryption</h3>
                        <p>Unlock with a geometric pattern. The pattern itself acts as the decryption key. No pattern, no data.</p>
                    </div>

                    <div class="feature-card">
                        <div class="feature-icon">🎭</div>
                        <h3>True Plausible Deniability</h3>
                        <p>Every pattern opens up a vault. You can set up as many decoy vaults as you want.</p>
                    </div>

                    <div class="feature-card">
                        <div class="feature-icon">🕶️</div>
                        <h3>Hidden Vaults</h3>
                        <p>Nobody can tell how many vaults exist on your device. Storage space is obfuscated to prevent analysis.</p>
                    </div>

                    <div class="feature-card">
                        <div class="feature-icon">🚨</div>
                        <h3>Duress Mode</h3>
                        <p>Set a “Duress Vault” that when opened instantly deletes all other vaults without any notice.</p>
                    </div>

                    <div class="feature-card">
                        <div class="feature-icon">☁️</div>
                        <h3>Encrypted iCloud Backup</h3>
                        <p>Optional off-site backup. Your data is encrypted locally <i>before</i> it ever touches Apple’s servers.</p>
                    </div>

                    <div class="feature-card">
                        <div class="feature-icon">🤝</div>
                        <h3>Secure Sharing</h3>
                        <p>Share vaults with others. Automatic synchronization, data export prevention, expiration and limit number of opens are all built in.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- How It Works (from baseline design-4379) -->
        <section id="how-it-works" class="timeline-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="section-header">
                    <h2 style="color: var(--text-dark)">How It Works</h2>
                </div>
                <div class="timeline">
                    <div class="step">
                        <div class="step-marker"></div>
                        <div class="step-number">01</div>
                        <h3>Define Your Pattern</h3>
                        <p>Draw a unique geometric pattern to generate a high-entropy encryption key.<br>The key is created directly on your device’s Secure Enclave.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="step">
                        <div class="step-marker"></div>
                        <div class="step-number">02</div>
                        <h3>Load the Vault</h3>
                        <p>Import photos, documents, and notes. Files are instantly encrypted using AES-256 before being written to disk.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="step">
                        <div class="step-marker"></div>
                        <div class="step-number">03</div>
                        <h3>Lock & Vanish</h3>
                        <p>Close the app. The decryption keys are wiped from memory. Without the pattern, your files look like random noise.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- Security (from baseline design-4379) -->
        <section id="security" class="security-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="tech-specs">
                    <div class="tech-content">
                        <h3>Security Architecture</h3>
                        <p style="color: var(--accent-dark); font-size: 1.1rem;">We don’t trust servers. We trust math.</p>
                        <ul>
                            <li><strong>AES-256-GCM</strong> file encryption</li>
                            <li><strong>Argon2id</strong> key derivation</li>
                            <li><strong>ChaCha20</strong> stream cipher for metadata</li>
                            <li><strong>Zero-Knowledge</strong> architecture</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="tech-diagram">
                        <div class="code-block">
                            <span class="code-key">const</span> vaultConfig = {<br>
                              cipher: <span class="code-val">"AES-256-GCM"</span>,<br>
                              kdf: <span class="code-val">"Argon2id"</span>,<br>
                              iterations: <span class="code-val">128000</span>,<br>
                              salt: <span class="code-val">unique_per_vault</span>,<br>
                              cloud_sync: <span class="code-val">false</span> // default<br>
                            };<br><br>
                            <span style="color: var(--text-secondary)">// Server knows nothing.</span><br>
                            <span style="color: var(--text-secondary)">// Only your pattern decrypts.</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- FAQ (from baseline design-4379) -->
        <section id="faq" class="faq-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="section-header">
                    <h2 style="color: var(--text-dark)">Common Questions</h2>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-grid">
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">What happens if I forget my pattern?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>You are provided with a secret passphrase that recovers the vault. However if your forget that too, the data is lost. We do not store keys or have a backdoor to the data.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">Can Apple see my files?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>No. If you enable iCloud backup, we upload an encrypted blob. Apple hosts the file, but without your pattern key, it is mathematically impossible for them to read it.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">Do I need an account?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>Absolutely not. Vaultaire works right out of the box. No email, no phone number, no signup.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">Do you optimize my data?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>You have an option to store pictures and videos in optimized form, saving space and allowing for faster shares.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">How does sharing work?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>When you share a vault you are provided with a secret phrase that differs from the vault recovery phrase. Recipient can use it to obtain copy of the data. You control how long they keep access or how many times they can open the vault. If you add files, the data is synchronized automatically.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">Do you support folders?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>Not at this time. Instead we suggest you use different vaults to store different data.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">What kind of data can I store?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>There is no limitation. Any file can be stored and shared.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">How many vaults can I have?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>In the free version you are limited to 10 vaults. In paid it’s unlimited.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">How many files can I have per vault?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>There is no limit, however more files you add, bigger the vault and sharing becomes slower.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                    <details class="faq-item">
                        <summary class="faq-summary">Do you collect any analytical data?</summary>
                        <div class="faq-content">
                            <p>If you give us permission (can be revoked at any time), we collect bugs, crashes and basic analytical information. There are no accounts, identity or any personal data attached. We have no idea who you are or what you are using Vaultaire for.</p>
                        </div>
                    </details>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <!-- Footer (from baseline design-4379) -->
    <footer>
        <div class="container footer-content">
            <div class="footer-brand">
                <h4 style="color: var(--text-dark)">Vaultaire</h4>
                <p style="color: var(--text-secondary); font-size: 0.8rem; margin-top: 8px;">© 2026 Wraxle LLC</p>
            </div>
            <div class="footer-links">
                <a href="index.html">Home</a>
                <a href="manifesto/index.html">Manifesto</a>
                <a href="privacy/index.html">Privacy Policy</a>
                <a href="terms/index.html">Terms of Use</a>
                <a href="s/index.html">Vault Invite</a>
                <a href="mailto:support@vaultaire.app">Support</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </footer>

    <script>
        (function () {
            const root = document.documentElement;
            const themeToggle = document.getElementById('theme-toggle');
            const themeIcon = document.getElementById('theme-icon');
            const themeLabel = document.getElementById('theme-label');
            const preferred = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
            const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('vaultaire-theme');
            const hasUserOverride = savedTheme === 'dark' || savedTheme === 'light';

            const toRgba = (hex, alpha) => {
                const normalized = hex.replace('#', '').trim();
                const fullHex = normalized.length === 3
                    ? normalized.split('').map(ch => ch + ch).join('')
                    : normalized;

                if (!/^[0-9a-fA-F]{6}$/.test(fullHex)) {
                    return `rgba(204, 195, 248, ${alpha})`;
                }

                const r = parseInt(fullHex.slice(0, 2), 16);
                const g = parseInt(fullHex.slice(2, 4), 16);
                const b = parseInt(fullHex.slice(4, 6), 16);
                return `rgba(${r}, ${g}, ${b}, ${alpha})`;
            };

            function setTheme(theme, persist) {
                root.dataset.theme = theme;
                const isDark = theme === 'dark';
                themeIcon.textContent = isDark ? '☀︎' : '☽';
                themeLabel.textContent = isDark ? 'Light' : 'Dark';
                themeToggle.setAttribute('aria-pressed', String(!isDark));
                themeToggle.setAttribute('aria-label', `Switch to ${isDark ? 'light' : 'dark'} mode`);
                if (persist) {
                    localStorage.setItem('vaultaire-theme', theme);
                }
                updateCanvasTheme();
            }

            const canvas = document.getElementById('pattern-canvas');
            const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
            let width = 0;
            let height = 0;
            let bgDots = [];
            let accentColor = '#CCC3F8';
            let accentTrailColor = 'rgba(204, 195, 248, 0.4)';

            function updateCanvasTheme() {
                const styles = getComputedStyle(root);
                accentColor = styles.getPropertyValue('--accent-dark').trim() || '#CCC3F8';
                accentTrailColor = toRgba(accentColor, 0.35);
            }

            setTheme(hasUserOverride ? savedTheme : (preferred.matches ? 'dark' : 'light'), false);

            themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
                const next = root.dataset.theme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark';
                setTheme(next, true);
            });

            preferred.addEventListener('change', (event) => {
                if (!localStorage.getItem('vaultaire-theme')) {
                    setTheme(event.matches ? 'dark' : 'light', false);
                }
            });

            function resize() {
                width = canvas.width = canvas.parentElement.offsetWidth;
                height = canvas.height = canvas.parentElement.offsetHeight;
                initDots();
            }

            function initDots() {
                bgDots = [];
                const spacing = 110;
                const rows = Math.ceil(height / spacing);
                const cols = Math.ceil(width / spacing);

                for (let i = 0; i < cols; i += 1) {
                    for (let j = 0; j < rows; j += 1) {
                        bgDots.push({
                            x: i * spacing + (Math.random() * 24),
                            y: j * spacing + (Math.random() * 24)
                        });
                    }
                }
            }

            let drawingPath = false;
            function drawRandomPattern() {
                if (drawingPath || bgDots.length === 0) return;
                drawingPath = true;

                const startIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * bgDots.length);
                const pathLength = 4 + Math.floor(Math.random() * 3);
                const start = bgDots[startIndex];
                let current = start;

                ctx.strokeStyle = accentTrailColor;
                ctx.lineWidth = 2;
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.moveTo(start.x, start.y);

                for (let i = 0; i < pathLength; i += 1) {
                    const next = bgDots[Math.floor(Math.random() * bgDots.length)];
                    const dist = Math.hypot(next.x - current.x, next.y - current.y);
                    if (dist < 200 && dist > 36) {
                        ctx.lineTo(next.x, next.y);
                        current = next;
                    }
                }
                ctx.stroke();

                setTimeout(() => {
                    drawingPath = false;
                }, 540);
            }

            function draw() {
                ctx.clearRect(0, 0, width, height);
                ctx.fillStyle = accentColor;
                bgDots.forEach((dot) => {
                    ctx.beginPath();
                    ctx.arc(dot.x, dot.y, 1.4, 0, Math.PI * 2);
                    ctx.fill();
                });

                if (Math.random() > 0.95) {
                    drawRandomPattern();
                }

                requestAnimationFrame(draw);
            }

            window.addEventListener('resize', resize);
            resize();
            draw();

            const dots = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.grid-dot'));
            const pathEl = document.getElementById('drawing-path');
            const cursorEl = document.getElementById('drawing-cursor');
            const svgEl = document.getElementById('mockup-svg');
            const lockZone = document.getElementById('pattern-lock-zone');
            const phoneScreen = document.querySelector('.phone-screen');
            const mockupTimeEl = document.getElementById('mockup-time');

            const sequences = [
                [0, 5, 6, 7, 12, 17, 16, 15, 20, 21, 22, 23, 24]
            ];
            let sequenceIndex = 0;
            let nodeCenters = [];

            const sleep = (ms) => new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, ms));

            function updateMockupTime() {
                const now = new Date();
                const hour = ((now.getHours() + 11) % 12) + 1;
                const minute = String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0');
                mockupTimeEl.textContent = `${hour}:${minute}`;
            }

            function scheduleMockupMinuteTick() {
                updateMockupTime();
                const now = new Date();
                const msUntilNextMinute = ((60 - now.getSeconds()) * 1000) - now.getMilliseconds();
                setTimeout(scheduleMockupMinuteTick, Math.max(200, msUntilNextMinute));
            }

            scheduleMockupMinuteTick();

            function computeNodeCenters() {
                const baseRect = lockZone.getBoundingClientRect();
                svgEl.setAttribute('viewBox', `0 0 ${baseRect.width} ${baseRect.height}`);
                svgEl.setAttribute('width', `${baseRect.width}`);
                svgEl.setAttribute('height', `${baseRect.height}`);
                nodeCenters = dots.map((dot) => {
                    const rect = dot.getBoundingClientRect();
                    return {
                        x: rect.left - baseRect.left + (rect.width / 2),
                        y: rect.top - baseRect.top + (rect.height / 2)
                    };
                });
            }

            function setPath(points) {
                if (points.length === 0) {
                    pathEl.setAttribute('d', '');
                    cursorEl.style.opacity = '0';
                    return;
                }
                const commands = points.map((point, idx) => {
                    const cmd = idx === 0 ? 'M' : 'L';
                    return `${cmd} ${point.x.toFixed(2)} ${point.y.toFixed(2)}`;
                });
                pathEl.setAttribute('d', commands.join(' '));
                const tail = points[points.length - 1];
                cursorEl.setAttribute('cx', tail.x.toFixed(2));
                cursorEl.setAttribute('cy', tail.y.toFixed(2));
                cursorEl.style.opacity = '1';
            }

            function animateSegment(stablePoints, fromPoint, toPoint, durationMs) {
                return new Promise((resolve) => {
                    const startedAt = performance.now();

                    function tick(now) {
                        const progress = Math.min(1, (now - startedAt) / durationMs);
                        const x = fromPoint.x + ((toPoint.x - fromPoint.x) * progress);
                        const y = fromPoint.y + ((toPoint.y - fromPoint.y) * progress);
                        setPath([...stablePoints, { x, y }]);

                        if (progress < 1) {
                            requestAnimationFrame(tick);
                        } else {
                            resolve();
                        }
                    }

                    requestAnimationFrame(tick);
                });
            }

            async function runSequence(sequence) {
                dots.forEach((dot) => dot.classList.remove('active'));
                setPath([]);
                const points = [];
                computeNodeCenters();
                await sleep(250);

                if (sequence.length === 0) return;

                const firstNode = sequence[0];
                dots[firstNode].classList.add('active');
                points.push(nodeCenters[firstNode]);
                setPath(points);

                for (let i = 1; i < sequence.length; i += 1) {
                    const prevPoint = nodeCenters[sequence[i - 1]];
                    const nextPoint = nodeCenters[sequence[i]];
                    const stablePoints = points.slice(0);
                    await animateSegment(stablePoints, prevPoint, nextPoint, 170);

                    dots[sequence[i]].classList.add('active');
                    points.push(nextPoint);
                    setPath(points);
                }

                await sleep(220);
                phoneScreen.classList.add('mockup-unlocking');
                await sleep(980);
                phoneScreen.classList.remove('mockup-unlocking');
                phoneScreen.classList.add('mockup-vault');
                await sleep(5000);
                phoneScreen.classList.remove('mockup-vault');

                dots.forEach((dot) => dot.classList.remove('active'));
                setPath([]);
                await sleep(430);
            }

            (async function animatePatternLoop() {
                await sleep(700);
                while (true) {
                    const sequence = sequences[sequenceIndex];
                    await runSequence(sequence);
                    sequenceIndex = (sequenceIndex + 1) % sequences.length;
                }
            })();
        })();
    </script>

</body></html>

file.content:
Vaultaire
Home Features How It Works Security Manifesto FAQ
Get App

The case for Vaultaire

Privacy apps have a fatal flaw: they look like privacy apps. This manifesto explains why Vaultaire was built to remove proof, not add another lock screen.

Privacy apps have a fatal flaw: they look like privacy apps.

A locked folder announces it's locked. A hidden gallery called “Calculator+” fools no one who's looking. Every “secure” photo vault on your iPhone shares the same problem: it proves you have something to hide.

When someone forces you to unlock your phone, whether that's a border agent, an abusive partner, or an authoritarian government, they see the app, they see the lock, and they don't stop until you open it.

Vaultaire doesn't hide your files behind a lock. It makes them cease to exist.

How encrypted photo storage should actually work

Draw a pattern on the grid. A vault opens with your private photos, videos, and documents, each file individually encrypted with AES-256-GCM using hardware-backed keys from Apple's Secure Enclave. Draw a different pattern, and a completely different vault opens. Different files, different encryption keys, different everything.

Enter the wrong pattern? No error message. No “incorrect password.” Just an empty vault. There is no observable difference between “wrong” and “empty.”

Every vault sits inside a pre-allocated block of encrypted noise. Whether you've stored zero files or five hundred, the data on disk looks identical. Forensic tools can't tell the difference. There is nothing to find because there is nothing that looks like something to find.

This is not a lock on a door. It's a wall where the door used to be.

Why zero-knowledge architecture matters

Most photo vault apps put a PIN screen in front of unencrypted files. If someone connects your phone to a computer, the files are right there, completely readable. That's not security. That's a curtain.

Vaultaire was built around a single principle: no one, not us, not Apple, not a forensic examiner, can prove your files exist. Privacy is not something we bolted on after the fact. It's how the app works at every layer.

No accounts. No email, no phone number, no identity to tie back to you. Nothing to subpoena.

No cloud dependency. Your files never leave your device unless you explicitly choose encrypted iCloud backup or encrypted vault sharing. Even then, the server only sees noise.

No biometrics. Face ID and fingerprints can be compelled by law enforcement. A pattern in your head can't be extracted. We left biometrics out on purpose.

No “forgot password.” No server knows your pattern. No email reset. No backdoor. A 12-word recovery phrase exists for those who want it, stored only on your device. There is no way in for anyone but you.

Your pattern goes through 600,000 rounds of PBKDF2 to derive a 256-bit encryption key. That key lives only in memory and gets wiped the moment the app locks. We never see it. We can't recover it. That's the point.

Who it's for

Journalists protecting sources where phone searches are routine. Activists carrying documentation under government surveillance. Domestic abuse survivors keeping evidence secure on a device they know is being monitored. Travelers crossing borders where device inspection is mandatory. Attorneys with privileged materials on personal phones.

And anyone who gets that privacy isn't about having something to hide. It's about having something worth protecting.

The duress vault

Designate any vault as a duress trigger. When that pattern is drawn under coercion, every other vault is silently and permanently destroyed. The duress vault opens normally. The person watching sees cooperation and an ordinary-looking vault with a few harmless photos. They have no way to know that anything else ever existed.

No other encrypted vault app does this.

What we won't build

We won't add biometric unlock, because it can be legally compelled. We won't add cloud-dependent storage, because it creates a target for subpoenas and breaches. We won't add analytics that track how you use the app. We won't add a backdoor dressed up as account recovery. We won't weaken the architecture for convenience.

Every decision in Vaultaire comes back to one thing: your private files stay yours, under any circumstance.

Vaultaire is a private, encrypted photo and file vault for iPhone. It does not collect, transmit, or store any personal information. All AES-256-GCM encryption is performed locally on your device using Apple's Secure Enclave. We cannot access your files, your patterns, or your recovery phrases, by design.

Vaultaire

© 2026 Wraxle LLC

Home Manifesto Privacy Policy Terms of Use Vault Invite Support

Fetch iTunes lookup API data for these 10 app IDs and save each as a JSON file in /Users/nan/Work/ai/vault/outputs/vaultaire/competitors/. First create the directory if it doesn't exist.

For each app, fetch from: https://itunes.apple.com/lookup?id=APPID&country=us

The 10 competitors:
1. Private Photo Vault - Pic Safe → slug: private-photo-vault, ID: 417571834
2. Secret Photo Vault: Keepsafe → slug: keepsafe, ID: 510873505
3. Privault → slug: privault, ID: 1186436980
4. SPV - Photo Vault → slug: spv, ID: 1449239240
5. Secret Photo Album SA → slug: secret-photo-album, ID: 1174964304
6. PV Secret Photo Album → slug: pv-secret-photo-album, ID: 867586326
7. Calculator# Hide Photos Videos → slug: calculator-hide-photos, ID: 1165276801
8. Secret Photo Vault Lock Photos → slug: secret-photo-vault, ID: 448033053
9. Hide it Pro → slug: hide-it-pro, ID: 523488488
10. Safe Lock - Hidden Photo Vault → slug: safe-lock, ID: 1195429570

For each competitor, save a JSON file at /Users/nan/Work/ai/vault/outputs/vaultaire/competitors/[slug].json

The JSON structure for each should be:
```json
{
  "slug": "...",
  "appId": "...",
  "name": "...",
  "developer": "...",
  "description": "...",
  "price": "...",
  "formattedPrice": "...",
  "rating": ...,
  "ratingCount": ...,
  "iconUrl": "...",
  "version": "...",
  "categories": [...],
  "bundleId": "...",
  "storeUrl": "...",
  "features": {
    "aes256gcm": false,
    "secureEnclave": false,
    "patternLock": false,
    "multipleVaults": false,
    "duressVault": false,
    "zeroKnowledge": false,
    "encryptedBackup": false,
    "encryptedSharing": false,
    "recoveryPhrase": false,
    "noBiometrics": false,
    "photosVideosFiles": true,
    "mediaOptimization": false,
    "freeTier": true,
    "noAdsFreeTier": false,
    "shareSheetImport": true,
    "cameraCapture": true,
    "offlineByDefault": false
  },
  "pricing": {
    "freeTierLimits": "...",
    "subscriptionMonthly": "...",
    "subscriptionAnnual": "...",
    "lifetime": "...",
    "notes": "..."
  },
  "complaints": [],
  "positioning": "..."
}
```

For each competitor after fetching the iTunes data:
1. Extract the relevant fields from the API response (name, description, price, formattedPrice, averageUserRating, userRatingCount, artworkUrl512, version, genres, bundleId, trackViewUrl)
2. Analyze their App Store description to fill in the features boolean table. Most of these competitors use PIN/password protection, NOT real encryption. They generally don't have: AES-256-GCM, Secure Enclave, pattern lock, duress vault, zero-knowledge, encrypted backup, encrypted sharing, recovery phrase, media optimization, offline-by-default. Most DO have: free tier, photos/videos support, share sheet import, camera capture. Check descriptions for biometrics (most offer FaceID/TouchID). Check if they have multiple albums/vaults.
3. For pricing, extract from the iTunes data if available, and note what's typically locked behind paywalls
4. For complaints, add 3-5 common complaint themes based on what's typical for photo vault apps: "Ads in free version", "Lost photos after update", "Subscription too expensive", "PIN-only security (no real encryption)", "Can't recover if forgot password"
5. For positioning, write a 1-sentence statement about how Vaultaire differs from this specific competitor

Also fetch the App Store web page for each to try to get review data and in-app purchase pricing. Use: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id{APPID}

Do all the WebFetch calls in parallel where possible to speed things up.
